dataset_info.dataset_name: Mission Practice GP Reviews - Sentiment Analysis
dataset_info.source: Google Reviews for The Mission Practice GP surgery

vectorization_methods.Bag_of_words: Each document is represented as a vector of word counts over the selected vocabulary.
vectorization_methods.Tf_idf: Each document is represented as a TF-IDF weighted vector, emphasizing words that are distinctive for that review.

sentiment_labels.description: Sentiment labels assigned to classify review sentiment
